backend/main.mo: Stores user records keyed by principal and provides registration, login timestamp updates, and lookup helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark theme OKLCH color tokens and applying global background and text classes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for landing, launcher, and tile pages and renders the router provider.
frontend/src/app/tiles.ts: Defines metadata for 8 launcher tiles including id, name, description, and route.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Redirects authenticated users to the launcher and shows the landing page otherwise.
frontend/src/components/DisclaimerBanner: UI alert banner warning that the app is an unaffiliated demo.
frontend/src/components/SignedInHeader.t: Header showing the user principal and a sign‑out button that clears query cache and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that constructs a backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthRefresh.ts: Handles user registration after login and clears cache on logout based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, identity loading, and related status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and applies global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the sign‑in screen with email input, Internet Identity login trigger, error handling, and themed layout.
frontend/src/pages/LauncherPage.tsx: Shows the post‑login app launcher with search, user record display, tile grid navigation, and auth guard.
frontend/src/pages/TilePlaceholderPage.t: Renders placeholder pages for individual tiles with auth guarding and simple descriptive content.
frontend/src/queries/userQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching user records, registration, and registration status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/queryClient.ts: Configures a shared React Query client with default staleTime and retry behavior.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens using OKLCH variables and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, features, images, and current build state for the Live.com‑style app.
